title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression on row[0]
description: When a filter is set using the expression 'row[0] equals to 0', the result set is incorrect or returns null.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the dataset with the filter 'row[0] equals to '
EB: The dataset should return the expected result and not use 'row[0]' as a filter expression.
SR:
1. Open the dataset
2. Set a filter with the expression 'row[0] equals to '
3. Click on the Preview tab

Expected result: The dataset should return the expected result without using 'row[0]' as a filter expression.
